      • buildForwardsGraph

        public ReachabilityGraph buildForwardsGraph(PTA pta,
                                            java.util.BitSet targetLocs,
                                            Constraint targetConstraint)
                                     throws PrismException
        Build a reachability graph based on a forwards PTA traversal. All zones in the symbolic states in the graph are guaranteed to be convex (i.e. DBMs). The set of target states found and the (singleton) set of initial states are stored separately and can be obtained subsequently using getTarget() and getInitialStates().
        Throws:
        PrismException

      • buildForwardsGraphFormats10

        private ReachabilityGraph buildForwardsGraphFormats10(PTA pta,
                                                      java.util.BitSet targetLocs,
                                                      Constraint targetConstraint)
                                               throws PrismException
        Implementation of buildForwardsGraph(pta.PTA, java.util.BitSet, pta.Constraint) using FORMATS'10 definition.
        Throws:
        PrismException

      • buildForwardsGraphFormats09

        private ReachabilityGraph buildForwardsGraphFormats09(PTA pta,
                                                      java.util.BitSet targetLocs,
                                                      Constraint targetConstraint)
                                               throws PrismException
        Implementation of buildForwardsGraph(pta.PTA, java.util.BitSet, pta.Constraint) using FORMATS'09 definition. This should not be used any more since changes/improvements to e.g. timelock detection have been implemented under the assumption that the default (FORMATS'10) algorithm is used.
        Throws:
        PrismException
